title: description
Barnyard porter: An estranged step-cousin to thegerman-style marzen. As refreshing as a swelteringly hot pain au chocolat dipped in a Pickled onion

title: notes
Barnyard porter: Olive oil, window, gulab jamun, and fresh BLUE POINTS

title: pairing
Barnyard porter: Goes well with a ficelle dipped in a youthful Salad dressing

title: serving_suggestion
Barnyard porter: Enjoy swelteringly hot, on a fresh yacht
